title: If there is no data for series, it should display a friendly error message.
OB: When there is no data available for a series, the application does not provide a friendly error message.
EB: When there is no data available for a series, it should display a friendly error message to remind the user.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the application. 2. Navigate to the series section that has no data. Ensure that the error message is displayed correctly.
